meanings.definition: Relating to the electrical activity of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioelectrical signals in our bodies help our muscles move.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study bioelectrical activity in the heart to understand its function.
meanings.sent3: The bioelectrical dance of fireflies at night is truly mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: The bioelectrical connections in the brain are like a complex network of wires.
meanings.sent5: The bioelectrical impulses in a plant can respond to external stimuli.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of electricity in biological processes.
meanings.sent1: Bioelectrical experiments help scientists understand how cells function.
meanings.sent2: The bioelectrical equipment in the lab is essential for our research.
meanings.sent3: The bioelectrical toaster burnt the toast to a crisp this morning.
meanings.sent4: The bioelectrical system of the body is like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The bioelectrical stimulation therapy can aid in muscle recovery.
